name: CRAZY MAZE
description:
This game is a maze game for smart people. The labyrinth has many forks, portals, and many unremarkable places. It may be the correct way. There are 12 maps in total. No level has been carefully designed and goes to the back. The harder the level, the bigger the maze map, and the game scene creates a beautiful 3D world, taking you into the maze and feeling the wonderful maze journey.
We have prepared labyrinths for you in four environments, each with three maps.
Environment 1: Daytime (a total of 3 maps in this environment)
Environment 2: Evening (a total of 3 maps in this environment)
Environment 3: Night (a total of 3 maps in this environment)
Environment 4: Mist (a total of 3 maps in this environment)

among them
The first map of each environment is a normal map that allows players to adapt to the new map environment.
The second map of each environment has a portal that can help you transfer to another place on the map.
On the third map of each environment, the map becomes huge and the challenge is more difficult

Environment 1-4, the map will be bigger and bigger

More environment is not yet to be continued....
